about_the_game:
Step into Dustopia, a post-apocalyptic collectible card game where survival depends on the cards in your deck. As a Card Hunter, you travel through a ruined world, facing relentless Machines, rival factions, and even other Hunters in battles where every choice could be your last.

Win your duels to take down the Machines, raid their high-tech bases for rare loot, and climb the ranks in the legendary Machine Arena. Every victory builds your deck and your reputation—but in a world ruled by cards, even fame can be deadly.

Are you ready to risk everything?

Story:

The world changed when The Machines arrived. They came to wipe us out, but one hacker’s genius discovered a glitch: force them into a card duel, and if you win, their program self-destructs. But the hacker is gone, leaving only scraps of their knowledge—and a chance, however slim, to turn the tide.

As a Card Hunter, you are humanity’s last hope. Raid Machine strongholds, duel rival Hunters, and gather the cards needed to survive. The hacker’s disappearance is a mystery woven into the ruins, and with every battle you grow closer to either salvation… or extinction.

Raids, Bounties, and Glory:

Raid Machine Strongholds

  • Dive into randomly generated Machine bases, packed with traps, patrols, and treasures.

  • Battle Machines in high-stakes duels to strip them of rare loot, from crafting materials to powerful cards.

  • Risk everything for Legendary cards in the toughest facilities, but beware—losing means death and losing your loot.

Conquer the Machine Arena

  • Enter a deadly spectator arena where Card Hunters fight for fame, wealth, and exclusive rewards.

  • Climb the ranks by defeating other Hunters in escalating duels with unique environmental mechanics and brutal Machines watching your every move.

Take on Bounties

  • Hunt rogue Card Hunters who’ve stolen rare cards or Machines controlling the wastelands.

  • Complete bounties for valuable rewards, including rare cards, consumables, and cash.

Survive Faction Wars

  • Side with warring towns fighting for dominance over limited resources and rare Machine tech.

  • Your choices will shift alliances, unlock faction-specific cards, and reshape the world.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dustopia is a single-player CCG of survival. The Machines rule the world, but one hacker’s glitch gave us a chance: defeat them in a card duel, and they self-destruct. As a Card Hunter, you raid their strongholds, collect powerful cards and battle in the Machine Arena!
